package.name: (V) Rock/Metal Music Carriers
package.shortDescription: Sing with me, sing for the years, sing for the laughter, sing for the tears!

descriptionlist.description: Rock/Metal Music Pack contains: AC/DC, Aerosmith, Anthrax, Arctic Monkeys, As I Lay Dying, Chthonic, Creed, HIM, Foo Fighters, Ill Nino, Ledd Zeppelin, Lynyrd Skynrd, Pink Floyd, and so much more! More to come!
